pkgmetadata.longdescription: Linguistic Fuzzy Logic // Various algorithms related to linguistic fuzzy logic: mining for linguistic fuzzy association rules, composition of fuzzy relations, performing perception- based logical deduction (PbLD), and forecasting time-series using fuzzy rule-based ensemble (FRBE) - see Burda (2015) doi:10.1109/FUZZ-IEEE.2015.7337826.
